oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Three teens charged with murder in slayings of West Memphis boys
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: West Memphis Three; West Memphis, Arkansas; murders; 1990s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Three pages from the newspaper, with multiple stories from the day after Damien Echols, Jason Baldwin and Jessie Misskelley were charged with the murders of three boys in West Memphis, Arkansas.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Perrusquia, Marc; Sullivan, Bartholomew; Thomas, William; Kelley, Richard; Coleman, Laura
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Jones, Steve; Cohen, Robert; McMullan, Michael; Ruthven, Colin; McComb, Dan
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Page 1 copy; Page 2 copy; Page 3 copy
